name: Ping-Pong Diplomacy (GB)
description:
PING-PONG DIPLOMACY is a homebrew software for the Nintendo Game Boy developed in C by Ryoga  using the GBDK (GameBoy Development Kit).

Controls:

START - start the game. UP and DOWN - move the China paddle.

This game/software was in development between the 2014/11/10 - 2014/12/14 in my free-time.

Ping-pong diplomacy - Context: Ping-pong diplomacy (Chinese: Pīngpāng wàijiāo) refers to the exchange of table tennis (ping-pong) players between the United States and People’s Republic of China (PRC) in the early 1970s. The event marked a thaw in U.S.–China relations that paved the way to a visit to Beijing by the U.S. President.

In order to run this rom you need to use a Game Boy / Game Boy Color emulator.
